Articles.Content:
I quite enjoy playing with remote tech, and would very much like to make unmanned launches before manned ones, however with the tech tree as it is currently that doesn't work very well (read at all) I was wondering if there were any mods currently in existence, or anyone that could make a mod like this. It would be nice if it also worked on parts packs to move their parts around as well. thanks guys

P.S. BTSM doesn't seem to fit my needs, and also isn't updated yet, so you don't need to comment that I could use that mod.

You could try [OpenTree](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122571-1-0-2-OpenTree-A-rebalanced-tech-tree-offering-more-freedom-mod-support-v2-1-2-%28June-6%29). It's a new mod, but it doesn't force you to start with manned missions. Worth a look.
thanks, I will check that out, looks like it will work

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106130-1-0-2-SETI-CommunityTechTree-Contracts-Greenhouse-BalanceMod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106130-1-0-2-SETI-CommunityTechTree-Contracts-Greenhouse-BalanceMod)

Thats what worked best for me, although i redid most part and science changes.

open tree doesn't quite work for me I will check out SETI, does the contract pack have an issue with contract configurator?

Edit: nvm, just noticed that it is required

> 
> open tree doesn't quite work for me I will check out SETI, does the contract pack have an issue with contract configurator?
> Edit: nvm, just noticed that it is required

You could try out my engineering based tree. You have your choice of paths to follow.
